text:
Jumeirah Creekside Hotel Hosts Modern Art Exhibition By Camille Ver
Jumeirah Creekside Hotel has unveiled its latest art exhibition by Camille Ver, a modern artist from the Philippines.
Renowned as an art and lifestyle hotel, Jumeirah Creekside will host the exhibition until 31 October 2015.
Ver is one of the Philippines’ leading contemporary abstract artists and through her exhibition entitled “Verses of Colour,” she transforms the urban environment into a universe of colour. In recent years, she has concentrated on architectural abstracts and the elegant reinterpretation of foliage and trees. Ver’s style is characterised by using large swathes of brushstrokes and colour experimentation.
Jumeirah Creekside Hotel is also home to a specially commissioned art collection which helps to connect the property to the region’s vibrant art and cultural heritage. A selection of Middle Eastern contemporary art is playfully arranged throughout the hotel, enabling guests to discover different sculptures and paintings through a series of chance encounters. Comprising 482 works by 51 contemporary artists, the exhibition also includes videos, limited edition series and mixed media works.
Source:- Jumeirah
